subtitle:
You are now a Premium Member and your
Platinum Placement(s) have been activated.

steps.title: 1. Profile Photo
steps.alt: Platinum profile with profile image highlighted
text: Add a high-resolution photo of at least 640x640 pixels to build trust and confidence in your profile. A professional-looking, high-resolution photo will increase your profile views and make your profile stand out.

steps.title: 2. Custom Tagline
text: For each of your Platinum placements, create a custom tagline that will get you noticed! Keep it short and sweet. Your tagline(s) should be fewer than 80 characters, including spaces.

steps.title: 3. Custom Description
text: Create a custom description that corresponds with the tagline for each of your Platinum placements. This will highlight your particular skills and qualifications. Each description should be fewer than 220 characters, including spaces.

steps.title: 4. Expanded Promotional Features
steps.alt: Platinum profile with promotional links highlighted
text: Each Platinum placement can promote up to two additional webpages. These could include a case results page, a testimonials page, a practice area page, or another page on your website.

steps.title: 5.  Custom "View Website" Link
steps.alt: Platinum profile with "Visit Website" link highlighted
text: Additionally, your Platinum placement also includes the ability to include a link to a custom URL. The "view website" button on your premium placement advertisement will link to the website address in your profile.

However, if you'd like to customize it to link to a particular URL, such as a practice area page on your site, please send us a link for each Platinum placement purchased and we’ll customize the "view website" button as instructed.
